altTitles.en: To Fall in Love With Spring

altTitles.fr: FALL IN LOVE WITH SPRING (Chatto chatto)

description.en:
Once emotions arise, they cannot be stopped.

Sisters x love x technology curiosity x crazy x robots

The winner of the Golden Comic Newcomer Award: Wu Yushi;
with his delicate and unique classical and gorgeous atmosphere,
A cool and beautiful dystopian fable.

The relationship between robots and humans, as sisters, is on the edge of fragmentation:
Christmas is coming,
Joe Dr. Milburn brings a gift to his daughter Lily - "Robot No. A-00".
Lily, who is lively and kind but often feels lonely, name this special friend "Shirley".
This is how she welcomed an important companion in her life who is like a sister.

When Shirley began to possess the magic stone "heart", complex and contradictory emotions, a broken body, the opposite sex that she care about...
What will gradually sprout from the cold machine body?
How should "it" become the real "her"?
___
The busy doctor mother prepares a robot as a companion for her daughter.
However, can the connection and intimacy between mother and daughter be replaced by a robot? 

When the daughter and the robot became sisters, why did they go from talking about everything to being suspicious of each other?

"If I had spoken out clearly at the beginning, would the ending not be what it is now?"
description.zh-hk:
情感一旦滋生，即無法停止

姐妹Ｘ愛情Ｘ科技獵奇Ｘ瘋狂Ｘ機器人

金漫新人獎得主──吳宇實，以細膩獨到的古典華美氛圍，
述說冷調綺麗的反烏托邦寓言。

機器人與人類，情同姐妹的關係遊走破碎邊緣───
聖誕節到來，
喬．米爾本博士為女兒莉莉帶來禮物──「編號A-00機器人」。
活潑善良卻時常感到孤單的莉莉，
將這位特別的朋友取名為「雪莉」，
就此迎來生命中，如姐妹般的重要同伴。
當雪莉開始擁有魔法石「心」，
複雜矛盾的情感、崩壞的身軀、特別在意的異性⋯⋯
從冰冷的機器身體裡，逐漸萌發出的會是什麼？
「它」該如何，成為真正的「她」？
____

忙碌的博士母親為女兒準備了機器人當同伴，然而母女相處的連結與親密感是機器人能取代的嗎？當女兒與機器人情同姊妹之後，為何會從無話不談變成彼此猜忌？如果當初有好好把話講開來說清楚，結局是否就不會是現在這個樣子了？
